entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 5:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers or drizzle early this evening. Snow and rain showers and periods of drizzle beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain changing to rain at times mixed with snow late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
